channel.title: analog on Tiffany Lo
channel.description: Recent content in analog on Tiffany Lo

item.title: Weather in Boston 09.2015
item.description: Frustrated with the inconsistency of Boston’s weather as we transitioned from Summer to Fall, I visualized the entirety of September 2015’s highs and lows every day into a compact accordion book. The comparative timeline nature of the format allows for a better overview understanding of the phenomenon experienced day in and day out in Boston. The scale shifts from red to purple, beginning at 90+ degrees and moving down in 10-degree increments.

item.title: Celebrate the Mini Wins in Life
item.description: “Celebrate the Mini Wins in Life!” is a personal mantra that I keep to remain thankful and optimistic despite the demands of everyday life. This poster is a party with vibrant colors, bold typography, and enough confetti to last all night long. Everything was hand-cut and drawn with love and care. It was an extremely time-consuming process. However, it was great fun to return to my papercraft roots and experiment organically throughout the design iterations.

item.title: Begin Anywhere
item.description: Begin Anywhere. A simple mantra that’s much harder to put into practice. I decided to open myself up to a new medium/approach — A ball of coral yarn and a large blank poster board to design on. The entire piece is interconnected, with no clear indication of where the thread begins. Another form of tactile lettering I attempted was popup lettering. I tried to play with perspective and lines with arrangement of the words to interpret the looseness that the mantra “begin anywhere” encourages.
